021import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.YamlDocument;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
025import net.tnemc.core.currency.CurrencyRegion;
026import net.tnemc.core.currency.CurrencySaver;
027import net.tnemc.core.currency.Denomination;
028import net.tnemc.core.currency.Note;
029import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
030import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemDenomination;
031import net.tnemc.core.utils.MISCUtils;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
034
035import java.io.File;
036import java.io.IOException;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.Optional;
039
040/**
041 * DefaultCurrencySaver
042 *
043 * @author creatorfromhell
044 * @since 0.1.2.0
045 */
046public class DefaultCurrencySaver implements CurrencySaver {
047
048  /**
049   * Saves all currencies.
050   *
051   * @param directory The directory used for saving.
052   */
053  @Override
054  public void saveCurrencies(final File directory) {
055
056    for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
057      saveCurrency(new File(directory, currency.getFile()), currency);
058    }
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Saves all currency UUIDs only.
063   *
064   * @param directory The directory used for saving.
065   */
066  @Override
067  public void saveCurrenciesUUID(final File directory) {
068
069    for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
070      saveID(directory, currency);
071    }
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Saves a specific currency
076   *
077   * @param directory The directory used for saving.
078   * @param currency  The currency to save.
079   */
080  @Override
081  public void saveCurrency(final File directory, final Currency currency) {
082
083    YamlDocument cur = null;
084
085    try {
086      cur = YamlDocument.create(directory);
087
088    } catch(final IOException e) {
089      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
090      return;
091    }
092
093    PluginCore.log().inform("Saving Currency: " + currency.getIdentifier());
094
095    //Currency Info configs.
096    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Server", "The server this currency belongs to, for data saving purposes.");
097    cur.set("Info.Server", MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Name"));
098
099    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Identifier", "The identifier of this currency used for various commands.");
100    cur.set("Info.Identifier", currency.getIdentifier());
101
102    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.UUIDAsId", "Whether to use the Identifier config as the currency's UUID. Not Recommended. Can lead to issues in the future");
103    cur.set("Info.UUIDAsId", false);
104
105    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Icon", "The material name to use as the icon for this currency in the plugin menus.");
106    cur.set("Info.Icon", currency.getIconMaterial());
107
108    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Major_Single", "The singular form of this currency's major denomination.");
109    cur.set("Info.Major_Single", currency.getDisplay());
110
111    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Major_Plural", "The plural form of this currency's major denomination.");
112    cur.set("Info.Major_Plural", currency.getDisplayPlural());
113
114    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Minor_Single", "The singular form of this currency's minor denomination.");
115    cur.set("Info.Minor_Single", currency.getDisplayMinor());
116
117    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Minor_Plural", "The plural form of this currency's minor denomination.");
118    cur.set("Info.Minor_Plural", currency.getDisplayMinorPlural());
119
120    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Symbol", "The character to use as the symbol for this currency.");
121    cur.set("Info.Symbol", currency.getSymbol());
122
123    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.UUID", "Used for data saving. Do NOT modify.");
124    cur.set("Info.UUID", currency.getUid().toString());
125
126    //World Configurations
127    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MultiRegion", "Configurations relating to multi region support.");
128    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MultiRegion.Regions", "Configurations relating to regions this currency is enabled in.");
129    for(final CurrencyRegion region : currency.getRegions().values()) {
130
131      if(region.region().equalsIgnoreCase("global")) {
132
133        MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Global", "Configurations relating to global configurations for this currency.");
134        MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Global.Enabled", "Should this currency be global?(i.e. usable in every world)");
135        cur.set("Options.Global.Enabled", region.isEnabled());
136
137        MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Global.Default", "Should this currency be the global default?");
138        cur.set("Options.Global.Default", region.isDefault());
139        continue;
140      }
141      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MultiRegion.Regions." + region.region() + ".Enabled", "Should this currency be enabled in this world?");
142      cur.set("Options.MultiRegion.Regions." + region.region() + ".Enabled", region.isEnabled());
143
144      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MultiRegion.Regions." + region.region() + ".Default", "Should this currency be the default in this world?");
145      cur.set("Options.MultiRegion.Regions." + region.region() + ".Default", region.isDefault());
146    }
147
148    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Disabled", "Whether this currency is enabled.");
149    cur.set("Options.Disabled", false);
150
151    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Sync", "Should this currency be synced across servers when enabled?");
152    cur.set("Options.Sync", true);
153
154    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MaxBalance", "The maximum balance possible for this currency.");
155    cur.set("Options.MaxBalance", currency.getMaxBalance().toPlainString());
156
157    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MinBalance", "The minimum balance possible for this currency.");
158    cur.set("Options.MinBalance", currency.getMinBalance().toPlainString());
159
160    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Balance", "The initial balance for accounts.");
161    cur.set("Options.Balance", currency.getStartingHoldings().toPlainString());
162
163    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Decimal", "The character to use as the decimal placeholder.");
164    cur.set("Options.Decimal", currency.getDecimal());
165
166    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.DecimalPlaces", "The amount of digits to display after the decimal character.(Max 4)");
167    cur.set("Options.DecimalPlaces", currency.getDecimalPlaces());
168
169    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Type", "The currency type to use for this currency. Valid Types: virtual, item, experience, mixed");
170    cur.set("Options.Type", currency.getType());
171
172    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Minor_Weight", "This is used to determine how many of minor it takes to make one major");
173    cur.set("Options.Minor_Weight", currency.getMinorWeight());
174
175    //Load our item-back currency configurations.
176    if(currency instanceof final ItemCurrency item) {
177
178      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item", "All configurations relating to item-backed currencies");
179      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.EnderChest", "Would you like your item currency balances to also check the player's ender chest?");
180      cur.set("Item.EnderChest", item.canEnderChest());
181
182      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.EnderFill", "Would you like your item currency items to go into the ender chest before dropping on the ground if inventory is full?");
183      cur.set("Item.EnderFill", item.isEnderFill());
184
185      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.ImportItems", "Whether to import exist item currencies into a player's balance with the first balance check for this currency.");
186      cur.set("Item.ImportItems", item.isImportItem());
187    }
188
189    //Formatting Configurations
190    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting", "All configurations related to formatting.");
191    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Format", "The format to use when outputting this currency into chat.");
192    cur.set("Formatting.Format", currency.getFormat());
193
194    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Prefixes", "The SI Prefixes used when <shorten> is used for the currency's format.");
195    cur.set("Formatting.Prefixes", currency.getPrefixes());
196
197    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Major_Separate", "Whether the major value should be separated every three numeric places.");
198    cur.set("Formatting.Major_Separate", currency.isSeparateMajor());
199
200    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Major_Separator", "The separator to use for numeric separation.");
201    cur.set("Formatting.Major_Separator", currency.getMajorSeparator());
202
203    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Balance", "Should this currency be shown in the balance commands.");
204    cur.set("Formatting.Balance", currency.isBalanceShow());
205
206    //Load our note configurations.
207    final Optional<Note> note = currency.getNote();
208
209    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note", "All configurations relating to currency notes.");
210    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Notable", "Whether this currency is able to be noted using the note command");
211    cur.set("Note.Notable", note.isPresent());
212    if(note.isPresent()) {
213
214      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Fee", "The fee to note this currency.");
215      cur.set("Note.Fee", note.get().getFee().asString());
216
217      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Minimum", "The minimum amount required to create a note for this currency.");
218      cur.set("Note.Minimum", note.get().getMinimum().toPlainString());
219
220      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item", "Configurations relating to the note item.");
221      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.Material", "The material to use.");
222      cur.set("Note.Item.Material", note.get().getMaterial());
223
224      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.ModelData", "The custom model data value used for this item. Defaults to 0. Optional");
225      cur.set("Note.Item.ModelData", note.get().getCustomModelData());
226
227      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.Texture", "The base64 texture to use if the material is PLAYER_HEAD");
228      cur.set("Note.Item.Texture", note.get().getTexture());
229
230      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.Item.Enchantments", "All configurations relating to enchantment identification for the note item");
231      cur.set("Note.Item.Item.Enchantments", note.get().getEnchantments());
232
233      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.Item.Flags", "All configurations relating to item flags identification for the note item");
234      cur.set("Note.Item.Item.Flags", note.get().getFlags());
235    }
236
237    //Conversion
238    if(!currency.getConversion().isEmpty()) {
239      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Converting", "Format is currency name and decimal based rate");
240
241      for(final Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : currency.getConversion().entrySet()) {
242        cur.set("Converting." + entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
243      }
244    }
245
246    try {
247      cur.save();
248    } catch(final IOException e) {
249      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
250    }
251
252    final File curDirectory = new File(directory.getParentFile(), currency.getIdentifier());
253    if(!curDirectory.exists()) {
254      try {
255
256        if(!curDirectory.mkdirs()) {
257
258          PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), DebugLevel.STANDARD);
259          return;
260        }
261      } catch(final Exception e) {
262
263        PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
264        return;
265      }
266    }
267
268    for(final Denomination denomination : currency.getDenominations().values()) {
269      saveDenomination(curDirectory, currency, denomination);
270    }
271  }
272
273  public void saveID(final File directory, final Currency currency) {
274
275    YamlDocument cur = null;
276
277    try {
278      cur = YamlDocument.create(new File(directory, currency.getIdentifier() + ".yml"));
279
280    } catch(final IOException e) {
281      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
282      return;
283    }
284
285    if(!cur.contains("Info.UUID")) {
286      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.UUID", "Used for data saving. Do NOT modify.");
287    }
288
289    cur.set("Info.UUID", currency.getUid().toString());
290
291    try {
292      cur.save();
293    } catch(final IOException e) {
294      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
295    }
296  }
297
298  /**
299   * Saves a specific currency denomination
300   *
301   * @param directory    The directory used for saving.
302   * @param currency     The currency of the denomination.
303   * @param denomination The denomination to save.
304   */
305  @Override
306  public void saveDenomination(final File directory, final Currency currency, final Denomination denomination) {
307
308    YamlDocument denom = null;
309    try {
310
311      denom = YamlDocument.create(new File(directory, denomination.singular() + ".yml"));
312    } catch(final IOException e) {
313      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency denomination: " + denomination.singular(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
314      return;
315    }
316
317    PluginCore.log().inform("Attempting to save currency denomination: " + denomination.singular());
318
319    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Info", "Configurations relating to basic information about this currency tier.");
320
321    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Info.Single", "The singular name of this tier.");
322    denom.set("Info.Single", denomination.singular());
323
324    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Info.Plural", "The plural name of this tier.");
325    denom.set("Info.Plural", denomination.plural());
326
327    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options", "Various options for this currency tier.");
328
329    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Weight", "The weight of the tier. E.X. 20USD would equal 20");
330    denom.set("Options.Weight", denomination.weight().doubleValue());
331
332    if(denomination instanceof final ItemDenomination itemDenomination) {
333
334      MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Material", "The material used for this item.");
335      denom.set("Options.Material", itemDenomination.material());
336
337      if(itemDenomination.getTexture() != null) {
338        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Texture", "The base64 texture to use if the material is PLAYER_HEAD");
339        denom.set("Options.Texture", itemDenomination.getTexture());
340      }
341
342      if(itemDenomination.getDamage() > 0) {
343        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Damage", "The damage value used for this item. Defaults to 0.(Optional)");
344        denom.set("Options.Damage", itemDenomination.getDamage());
345      }
346
347      if(itemDenomination.getName() != null) {
348        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Name", "The custom name this item must have in order to be considered currency.(Optional)");
349        denom.set("Options.Name", itemDenomination.getName());
350      }
351
352      if(!itemDenomination.getLore().isEmpty()) {
353        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Lore", "The lore string this item must have  in order to be considered currency.(Optional)");
354        denom.set("Options.Lore", itemDenomination.getLoreAsString());
355      }
356
357      if(itemDenomination.getCustomModel() > -1) {
358        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.ModelData", "The custom model data value used for this item. Defaults to 0.(Optional)");
359        denom.set("Options.ModelData", itemDenomination.getCustomModel());
360      }
361
362      if(!itemDenomination.enchantments().isEmpty()) {
363        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Enchantments", "All configurations relating to enchantment identification for currency tiers.(Optional)");
364        denom.set("Options.Enchantments", itemDenomination.enchantments());
365      }
366
367      if(!itemDenomination.flags().isEmpty()) {
368        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Flags", "All configurations relating to item flags identification for currency tiers.(Optional)");
369        denom.set("Options.Flags", itemDenomination.flags());
370      }
371
372      //TODO: Crafting stuff
373    }
374
375    try {
376      denom.save();
377    } catch(final IOException e) {
378      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency denomination: " + denomination.singular(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
379    }
380  }
381}
